entry.title: 🎉 欢迎订阅 App Store Discounts
entry.summary: 感谢您订阅我们的 RSS 源，我们是一个致力于为全球用户带来 App Store 最新折扣信息的社区驱动项目。我们的目标是让每一位用户都能第一时间掌握心爱应用的优惠动态，无论是应用本身的价格下调，还是内购项目的限时促销，我们都将为您一网打尽！
entry.content:
感谢您订阅我们的 RSS 源，我们是一个致力于为全球用户带来 App Store 最新折扣信息的社区驱动项目。我们的目标是让每一位用户都能第一时间掌握心爱应用的优惠动态，无论是应用本身的价格下调，还是内购项目的限时促销，我们都将为您一网打尽！

关于我们的 RSS 源

  • 专注于推送 App Store 应用的优惠信息
  • 只要应用价格降低或内购项降价，我们就会及时推送
  • 每个应用的优惠信息以单独的 feed 形式呈现
  • RSS 源完全开源，您可以随时查看、贡献和添加您关注的应用

找到我们

App Store Discounts

最后

如果本项目对你有帮助，请帮我们点个 ⭐️ 可好

entry.title: 暗黑联盟之暴打传说
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：HK$ 2.00 → 免費 [免費 ~ HK$ 2.00]）

全部价格信息

价格：免費

App 內購買項目

  • 2880 Diamonds：HK$ 98.00
  • 5000 Diamonds：HK$ 388.00
  • 5880 Diamonds：HK$ 588.00
  • 1880 Diamonds：HK$ 38.00
  • 1680 Diamonds：HK$ 32.00
  • 880 Diamonds：HK$ 98.00
  • 1480 Diamonds：HK$ 32.00
  • 780 Diamonds：HK$ 2,288.00
  • 1180 Diamonds：HK$ 8.00
  • 1000 Diamonds：HK$ 8.00

应用描述

玩法简介 翻牌收集表情鸡：翻开卡牌，收集各种造型夸张、情绪爆棚的尖叫鸡表情包！ 趣味合成升级：3只相同表情的尖叫鸡就能合成新等级，外形更可爱，尖叫声也更魔性！ 技能卡反转战局：使用搞怪技能卡，比如“群体尖叫”“强制合成”“鸡飞狗跳”，让战局瞬间翻盘！

entry.title: NARUTO: Ultimate Ninja STORM
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：HK$ 98.00 → HK$ 48.00 [HK$ 48.00 ~ HK$ 98.00]）

全部价格信息

价格：HK$ 48.00

应用描述

[Warning] Please Read Before Purchasing No refunds (including exchanges for other products, services, etc.) are available after purchase, regardless of the reason. Please ensure that your device is compatible via the app's Contact page (link below). https://bnfaq.channel.or.jp/title/3152 You are purchasing a license for digital goods. For full terms and conditions, please see the License Agreement below. [Game Summary] A Naruto game full of 3D competitive action! NARUTO: Ultimate Ninja STORM finally makes its way to smartphones! Experience the stories and battles of Naruto's childhood through beautiful graphics! Game Content Ultimate Mission Mode Relive the stories and famous battles from Naruto's childhood! You can freely move around the Hidden Leaf Village and take on missions and mini games! Free Battle Mode In Free Battle Mode, you can choose from 25 unique characters from Naruto's childhood and 10 support characters to enjoy a variety of powerful ninjutsu actions and battles! Changes for the App Easily activate ninjutsu, ultimate jutsu, and other actions with a tap! Even those playing the series for the first time can confidently enjoy the game! Plus, the following additional features and improvements have made the game easier to play: - New auto-save feature - New control mode selection for battle (casual/manual) - New battle assist feature (casual only) - Improved controls for battle and free movement - New retry feature for missions - Improved mini-game UI - Improved tutorial Play Notes - This game contains violent content. - Please pay attention to how long you play and avoid excessive gameplay. - 本遊戲部份內容涉及暴力情節 - 請注意遊戲時間,避免沉迷 [Number of Players] This is a single-player game only. [Storage] To download this app, you will need at least 3.5 GB of free space. When downloading, please ensure you have a strong internet connection and/or Wi-Fi environment. *Depending on your device, you may need more than the suggested storage amount. [Online] - There is no online battle mode. - Aside from the initial game download, you can play offline. - An internet connection is required to back up and transfer game data. Bandai Namco Entertainment Inc. Website: https://bandainamcoent.co.jp/english/ By downloading or installing this app, you agree to the Bandai Namco Entertainment Terms of Service. Terms of Service: https://legal.bandainamcoent.co.jp/terms/ Privacy Policy: https://legal.bandainamcoent.co.jp/privacy/ This application is distributed under the official rights from the license holder. ©2002 MASASHI KISHIMOTO ©Bandai Namco Entertainment Inc. Powered by "CRIWARE". CRIWARE is a trademark of CRI Middleware Co., Ltd.

应用截屏

iPhone

entry.title: Football Referee Simulator
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：HK$ 8.00 → HK$ 6.00 [HK$ 6.00 ~ HK$ 8.00]）

全部价格信息

价格：HK$ 6.00

应用描述

Football Referee Simulator—the groundbreaking mobile game that puts you in the referee's shoes! Are you ready to kickstart your career in the lower divisions and ascend to legendary status by overseeing thrilling finals? *** Experience Real-Time Game Simulation! *** Step onto the pitch and play a pivotal role in the game's outcome! With real-time simulation, every decision you make holds the power to shape the course of the match! ** Craft Your Journey and Elevate Your Character! ** Shape your own persona and chase after your goals! Stay updated with post-game news, claim prestigious awards, and elevate your personal stats! * Explore a Vast Football Universe! * Immerse yourself in a world featuring over 100 diverse clubs, 16 national teams, and a multitude of leagues and tournaments waiting to be conquered. No ads. No in-game purchases. All content is unlocked upon purchase. Football Referee Simulator offers seamless gameplay without interruptions. Localized in 11 languages—English, Spanish, Portuguese, French, German, Italian, Turkish, Indonesian, Polish, Greek and Russian—immerse yourself in the game in your preferred language!

应用截屏

iPhone

entry.title: OOTP Baseball 26 Go!
entry.content:
优惠信息

App 內購買項目

  • 75,000 PP for OOTP Go 26!：HK$ 388.00 → HK$ 288.00 [HK$ 288.00 ~ HK$ 388.00]

全部价格信息

价格：HK$ 88.00

App 內購買項目

  • OOTP26 Rainbow Booster Bundle：HK$ 148.00
  • 25k PP + 5 Standard Packs!：HK$ 148.00
  • 75k PP + 15 Standard Packs!：HK$ 388.00
  • 1M PP + 200 Standard Packs!：HK$ 3,888.00
  • 175k PP + 35 Standard Packs!：HK$ 788.00
  • OOTP26 Pack Booster Bundle：HK$ 148.00
  • 1M PP + Pack 2 for OOTP Go 26!：HK$ 3,888.00
  • 1M PP + Pack 3 for OOTP Go 26!：HK$ 3,888.00
  • 1M PP + Pack 1 for OOTP Go 26!：HK$ 3,888.00
  • 75,000 PP for OOTP Go 26!：HK$ 288.00

应用描述

Take the beloved Out of the Park Baseball series with you wherever you go. The award-winning baseball simulation game is now in your hands wherever you are in the world! Manage teams, control any franchise in 2025 or throughout MLB History, build and draft your Perfect Team, build a completely fictional baseball universe and so much more. You can oversee your league at a high level or play out each game in the gorgeous 3D game mode, managing play by play or even pitch by pitch. OOTP has it all covered. Play Your Way · Franchise Mode: A single-player oriented mode where you can run your favorite MLB, KBO, international or fictional baseball organization. 2025 MLB and 2025 KBO seasons - with accurate teams, schedules, and rosters - are included! Plus! 1927, 1984, and 2014 MLB seasons also included. · Perfect Team Mode: Build a dynasty in this online mode competing against players around the world. Manage MLB History · Gain access to historical MLB leagues and rosters from 1901 - 2024 · Simulate any and all MLB scenarios and games that you have dreamt of · Manage all on-field decisions and strategies · Draft, scout, trade, and sign players to build a powerhouse Official MLB & KBO Licenses · Full 2025 rosters from both MLB & KBO franchises free with game purchase · Includes full MLB and MiLB rosters Create Your Perfect Team · Create your own custom team to pit against players around the world · Cross-platform compatibility with Out of the Park Baseball 26 users · Pull and collect player cards from the vast player pool available · Compete in tournaments against other players to see who has the best team New This Year · Full Scouting System: Improve scouting accuracy on players, develop reports, choose priorities, assign scouting budgets, and more · 3D Upgrades: New dynamic scoreboard, custom randomized fictional park generation · Roster, AI, and Engine: Greatly improved AI, added more variety and detail in players ratings by expanding the internal scale · KBO Improvements: Added military service time and free agent cash compensation · Perfect Team Notifications: New settings all you to choose what to receive push notifications about · Perfect Team Clubhouse Stars: Purchase exclusive cards and pack bundles with these Stars; earned through tournaments, Perfect Draft, and league play. · Perfect Team Variants: New and revamped boosted-card mechanic, with a more user friendly way to boost; "feed as you go" · And more! OOTP Go 26 comes with an additional three historical MLB seasons for FREE! Run any franchise from the 1927, 1984, and 2014 MLB seasons. All other historical MLB seasons (1901-2024) available for purchase. Major League and MiLB trademarks and copyrights are used with permission of Major League Baseball. Officially Licensed Product – MLB Players, Inc. PLAYERS CHOICE® Out of the Park Developments © Copyright 2025. All Rights Reserved * Access permission notice for gameplay · STORAGE: The permission is required to store game data and will not access personal files such as photos. · MEMORY: Recommended system minimum of 2 GB RAM · PHONE: The permission is required to proceed with in-game events and rewards and will not affect calls. · CONTACTS: The permission is required to sync your friend list and Google Account. ※ You'll be able to enjoy the service except features related to above authorities even if you don't give permission to the above. "Consumer Information: • Language support: English, 한국어 • Items are available for purchase in this game. Some paid items may not be refundable depending on the type of item. • For Com2uS Mobile Game Terms of Service, visit http://www.withhive.com/. - Terms of Service : http://terms.withhive.com/terms/policy/view/M9/T1 - Privacy Policy : http://terms.withhive.com/terms/policy/view/M9/T3 • For questions or customer support, please contact our Customer Support by visiting https://support.ootpdevelopments.com/portal/en/home

应用截屏

iPhone

价格：HK$ 2.00

应用描述

你正在閱讀這段文字。 但為何？ 你是在尋找一款遊戲， 還是遊戲已找到你？ 《宗教公司》不僅僅是一款策略遊戲。 它是創造新現實的模擬。 你會塑造信仰， 還是信仰會塑造你？ 人類一直在黑暗中尋找光明。 一直渴望相信一些更偉大的事物， 那些賦予存在意義的東西。 這就是宗教誕生的原因—— 作為歷史風暴中的燈塔， 作為生命海洋中的指南針。 如果你成為一個宗教的創造者會怎樣？ 如果你可以建立自己的信仰、自己的真理、自己的現實呢？ 你是創造者。 你是源頭。 你是靈感。 如果你在閱讀這段文字——你已經在遊戲中！ 剩下的就是安裝——並享受創造宗教的過程與模擬！ 成為信仰的源泉——在策略模擬器《宗教公司》中。 人類一直感受到相信比自己更偉大的事物的需求。在歷史長河中，人們一直在尋找能引導他們穿越黑暗的光。對數百萬人來說，那光成為信仰。宗教成為燈塔，幫助許多人在這個世界找到意義，經受變革的風暴，並找到通往幸福的道路。 世界上有許多宗教，每一種都受到其時代與挑戰的塑造。但這個過程還能如何發展？人類的信仰又可能呈現出哪些迷人而多樣的形式？答案就在我們的新遊戲中！創建你獨一無二的宗教，經歷時間的考驗，看看它是否能引領人類走向團結。 遊戲特色 * 多樣的宗教原型，具有獨特的文化價值與傳統！ * 通過遊戲解鎖所有原型：一神教、靈性主義、萬神殿、薩滿教、異教等！ * 你的追隨者會成為狂熱的信徒還是達到更高的覺悟？選擇在你！ * 數百個現實世界的宗教元素——未來還有更多！了解更多世界宗教！ * 每個原型都具有獨特的主動能力——行奇蹟，改變世界！ * 放鬆的遊戲玩法，非常適合晚上休息時：用簡單的點擊收集信仰點，探索各種宗教元素。按照自己的節奏遊玩，享受其中！ 在策略模擬器《宗教公司》中，通過結合不同的宗教元素，創建你獨一無二的宗教。 願和平與愛與所有兄弟姐妹同在！

entry.title: Eco inc.
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：HK$ 58.00 → HK$ 2.00 [HK$ 2.00 ~ HK$ 58.00]）

全部价格信息

价格：HK$ 2.00

App 內購買項目

  • +2026 boosters ECO-Initiative!：HK$ 38.00
  • +444! Triple-Four Booster Pack：HK$ 18.00
  • +100 boosters ECO-Initiative!：HK$ 10.00

应用描述

A game about positive impact on nature and eco-friendly living. Ecology strategy games where you reconnect with nature and create a green world for future civilizations. Take on the role of a planet protection fund and stabilize its environmental situation. Join the global movement to save the planet Earth! About game ECO inc. Save The Earth: * Take on the role of a planet protection fund and develop environmental initiatives. * Various game mechanics: from resource management to diplomacy. * Complex tasks and unexpected events that will test your strategic thinking. * An opportunity to make a real contribution to saving the planet by raising awareness of environmental issues. *Global Challenges: Climate change, environmental pollution, resource depletion - all these challenges require your solution. Don't let the environmental catastrophe spread like a "plague" across the planet Earth. *Strategic Planning: Develop long-term plans, consider all factors, and make fateful decisions that will determine the future of the Earth. *Economic Development: Manage resources, invest in new technologies and build a green future world. *Volunteering: Send your heroes to help those in need, participate in international projects and fight for a clean planet. * Education: Raise your eco-awareness, study real problems and find ways to solve them. How to play the planet saving game tutorial guide: The player's goal is to stabilize the environmental situation on the entire planet at an early stage. Then, step by step, restore and improve the eco-situation of the Earth. Yeah, it's an epic quest ;) At the end of the game, you will receive statistics on how successful your mission was. Each step leads to different consequences, you will need to take thoughtful and quick actions. Useful information: Green Days: Eco Calendar — your personal guide to the planet’s most important environmental events! Follow Earth Days, Forest Days, Ocean Days, and Biodiversity Days. Plan your eco-actions and help make the world greener! List of Global Green Holidays: February 2 — World Wetlands Day March 3 — World Wildlife Day March 21 — International Day of Forests March 22 — World Water Day March 23 — World Meteorological Day April 7 — World Health Day (eco-focus) April 22 — Earth Day May 22 — International Day for Biological Diversity June 5 — World Environment Day June 8 — World Oceans Day June 17 — World Day to Combat Desertification and Drought July 28 — World Nature Conservation Day September 16 — International Day for the Preservation of the Ozone Layer October 4 — World Animal Day October 13 — International Day for Disaster Risk Reduction November 6 — International Day for Preventing the Exploitation of the Environment in War and Armed Conflict December 11 — International Mountain Day Join millions of eco heroes around the world and become part of the global movement to save the planet! :)

应用截屏

iPad

应用描述

-- 獲獎： ● 日本 2021 BitSummit THE 8th BIT | 官方入選 ● 韓國 2020 釜山獨立遊戲節 (BIC Fest) | 最佳休閒獎 ● 台灣 2020 巴哈姆特 ACG 創作大賽 | 銅賞 關於此遊戲： 《地城謎蹤》是一款考驗玩家 2D 空間邏輯和技能運用的解謎遊戲，你可以用劍打倒身旁的怪物、用弓箭攻擊遠處的敵人、用盾牌推動障礙物、甚至可以用手套拉動怪物改變他的位置。 此遊戲總共有 150 個精心設計的關卡，玩家必須要充分了解遊戲的機制才能順利過關。 而若要達成進階目標，則需要針對解法進行最佳化，有的時候甚至要拋棄原本的解法，重新以不同角度去觀察和思考才能達成。 遊戲特色： ● 地城+解謎+倉庫番 ● 150 個精心設計的關卡 ● 地城氛圍的像素美術 ● 非線性地城地圖 -- ● 在 Twitter 上追蹤我們 https://twitter.com/nekolyst ● 在 Facebook 上幫我們點讚 https://www.facebook.com/Nekolyst ● 加入我們的 Discord 群組 https://discord.gg/A7Sss9d

領導壯大中的德國軍隊東進或投身蘇維埃保衛祖國俄羅斯。在FROZEN FRONT中化身一位聰穎的指揮官，正確選擇戰爭策略，獲得更高的軍銜。 感受令人震撼的二戰場景，盡在HandyGames™的全新模擬類軍事策略遊戲！ 任務簡報 在1941年東部戰線的刺骨嚴寒中戰鬥！ 指揮坦克和步兵 攻克敵陣！ 派重型轟炸機 炸平敵軍指揮部！ 在惡劣地形中佈置你的炮兵部隊！ 為部隊提供物資和彈藥！ 抵禦人數遠超自身的敵人！ - 去除廣告！ - 二戰題材的回合制策略遊戲 - 激動人心的戰役和充滿挑戰的任務 - 白熱化的多人戰鬥 - 經典的德國 和蘇聯部隊 - 戰鬥中可修理，偽裝，構築各種人員和建物 - 雙方擁有步兵，炮兵，坦克和空軍 - 六角網格可一覽無餘 - 細膩的圖片和極為真實的聲效 感謝您選擇1941 Frozen Front！

  • 50 顆寶石：HK$ 32.00

应用描述

在期盼已久的 「 Clouds & Sheep 」遊戲續集中，可愛的羊羣終於再次得以解放！完成無數任務，滿足綿羊朋友的需求。種植花草樹木並剪不同顏色的羊毛來採購資源！收集快樂星星，收割木材和花瓣，並用它們來爲羊羣提供食物、飾品、玩具和其他東西！控制雲朵，及時降雨，確保綿羊永遠都不會缺飲用水。如果你的綿羊感到高興且滿足，牠們就會生下小羔羊！ 每只動物都需要你的關注！這些滾圓的綿羊喜歡休閒娛樂！讓你的綿羊跳躍起來，並使用蹦牀、蹺蹺板和鞦韆主動和牠們一起玩耍！旁觀你的寵物們互相交流，給牠們一些物品，然後觀察牠們的反應！使用有趣的物品自定義你的羊羣牧場，並從狂野西域和海盜領域等不同設定中進行選擇。旁觀你的羊羣白天不知疲憊地奔跑，而到了晚上就依着溫暖的篝火而眠。儘可能讓綿羊保持心情愉快、身體健康，防牠們變成天空中綿狀的大雲朵。 特色： - 去除廣告！ - 一流遊戲「 Clouds & Sheep 」的精彩續集 - 踏上史詩般的探險之路，找到傳奇般的青春泉水！ - 擁有可愛綿羊的模擬遊戲 - 照顧好羊羣 - 飼養甜美的小羔羊 - 積極和羊羣玩耍 - 給牠們提供許多不同的物品 - 種植並收割不同的資源 - 剪羊毛 - 自定義農場 - 控制天氣 - 日夜循環 - 3D 世界中的開放式遊戲設定 - 適合兒童，但全家人一起玩也非常有趣 - 支持MFi遊戲手柄 - 支持Game Center 感謝您選擇 'Clouds & Sheep 2'！您可以查看最新消息，隨時期待您的意見： 聯絡 HandyGamesTM: http://www.handy-games.com 在 Facebook 上關注我們：http://www.fb.com/handygames 在 Google+上及時瞭解動態： http://goo.gl/qkjngm 訂閱我們的 YouTube 頻道：http://goo.gl/2Kq6yY 在 Twitter 上追蹤新聞： http://www.twitter.com/handy_games 在 Instagram 上關注我們： http://instagram.com/handygames © www.handy-games.com GmbH

entry.title: This Is the Police
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：HK$ 55.00 → HK$ 12.00 [HK$ 12.00 ~ HK$ 55.00]）

全部价格信息

价格：HK$ 12.00

应用描述

《身為警察》（This Is the Police）是一個策略/冒險遊戲，故事背景設定在一個螺旋式圍繞排水系統的城市。在遊戲中你將擔任堅韌不拔的警察局長傑克·博伊德的角色，你將潛入一個關於犯罪和陰謀的深刻故事。傑克會不會拿到一大筆錢安心地退休，亦或是最終會破產...還是更糟？ - 你的任務很明確：在傑克·博伊德退休之前的180天內賺到50萬美元。怎麼賺？一切由你決定！ - 決定，決定！《身為警察》（This Is the Police）的故事核心是一個黑暗的故事，以及你該如何破解它。無論你決定什麼，你的選擇都會影響比賽 - 以及傑克博伊德的命運。 - 《黃昏三鏢客》？弗里堡警察局局長能夠應付各種人。遊戲全看你的本事，找到壞人並決定如何處理他們。 - 履行你的職責。作為弗里堡警察局的負責人，傑克每天都要處理各種各樣的挑戰：應對緊急情況，管理他的警員，保衛部門對抗市政廳和腐敗的市長等等。 - 執行調查並收集針對弗里堡犯罪團伙的證據。 - 處理城市中的競爭力量。每個人都可向你提供服務，但每一個都是有代價的。 - 豐富而完整的配音故事：由《毀滅公爵》的配音演員Jon St. John為傑克·博伊德配音。

应用截屏

iPhone

iPad

应用描述

將自己小村莊建成一個恢宏的中世紀帝國，打造繁榮的經濟和幸福的居民！尋覓採礦點，收割農作物，向國民徵收稅幣。營建角鬥場、酒館、市場，並用精美的雕塑、壯麗的紀念碑以及蔥郁的花園美化自己的城市。但是，仍然危機四伏。強盜在附近出沒，尋機掠奪和打劫您的和平城鎮。營建兵營，招募勇敢的士兵，建造守衛塔，保護你的鎮民免受傷害。從自己的城堡統治整個帝國，確保臣民歡樂幸福！ 特色 - 去除廣告！ - 中世紀的各種城市營建方式 - 聰明的居民忙碌於日常事務 - 複雜經濟模擬，深度生產鏈 - 數十種不同的城鎮和生產建物 - 軍事功能可選，可訓練士兵，智鬥強盜 - 季節、天氣，都有意義，都有效果 - 火災、疫病、乾旱及更多毀滅性災難 - 豐富多樣的情景和挑戰任務 - 無限制的沙盒遊戲模式 - 支持Game Center

孩子們，你們準備好了嗎？扮演海綿寶寶、派大星和珊迪，向邪惡的痞老闆展示犯罪得到的報酬甚至比蟹老闆還少。想利用強大的泡泡，從眾多猖獗的機器人那裏拯救比奇堡嗎？當然！想要蹦極？為什麼不呢！戰鬥正在進行中！ 特點： ● 扮演海綿寶寶、派大星和珊迪，並運用他們的獨特技能組合 ● 挫敗痞老闆的邪惡計劃——用他的古怪機器人大軍統治比奇堡 ● 遇見心愛系列中的無數角色 ● 忠實地重製了史上最好的海綿寶寶遊戲之一 ● 高端視覺效果，現代解析度和精心打磨的遊戲玩法 ● 全面控制器支持 ● 支持 Game Center 感謝您選擇 SpongeBob SquarePants: Battle for Bikini Bottom！您可以查看最新消息，隨時期待您的意見： 聯絡 HandyGamesTM: www.handy-games.com 在 Facebook 上關注我們：HandyGames 訂閱我們的 YouTube 頻道：HandyGames 在 Twitter 上追蹤新聞：@handy_games 在 Instagram 上關注我們：handygames © www.handy-games.com GmbH

entry.title: SkySafari 7 Pro
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：HK$ 288.00 → HK$ 228.00 [HK$ 98.00 ~ HK$ 388.00]）

全部价格信息

价格：HK$ 228.00

App 內購買項目

  • SkySafari Premium：HK$ 228.00
  • PGC Galaxy Database：HK$ 0.00
  • GAIA Star Database：HK$ 0.00
  • SkySafari Premium Monthly：HK$ 33.00
  • Apollo Lunar Missions：HK$ 0.00

应用描述

SkySafari makes stargazing a simple pleasure. It has the largest database of any astronomy app, includes every comet, asteroid, satellite & solar system object ever discovered, offers unparalleled accuracy, advanced planning and logging tools, flawless telescope control, and provides the very best experience under the stars when you depend on it. Don’t postpone joy. Discover why SkySafari is the #1 recommended astronomy app for serious amateur astronomers since 2009. Here's what’s new in version 7: + Complete support for iOS 18 and iPhone 16. Version 7 brings a new and immersive stargazing experience. + Events Finder - go to the new Events section to unlock a powerful search engine that finds astronomical events visible tonight and far into the future. The finder dynamically generates a listing of moon phases, eclipses, planetary moon events, meteor showers and planetary phenomenon such as conjunctions, elongations and oppositions. + Notifications - the notifications section has been completely revamped to allow you to customize and manage which events trigger an alert notification on your device. + Telescope Support - telescope control is at the heart of SkySafari. Version 7 takes a giant leap forward by supporting ASCOM Alpaca, INDI & StarSense Explorer. These next generation control protocols allow you to effortlessly connect to hundreds of compatible astronomical devices. SkySafari 7 brings social stargazing to mobile devices with two new features to help you connect with other like minded people. OneSky - allows you to see what other users are observing, in real time. This feature highlights objects in the sky chart and indicates with a number how many users are observing a particular object. SkyCast - allows you to guide a friend or group around the night sky through their own copy of SkySafari. After initiating SkyCast, you can generate a link and conveniently share it with other SkySafari users via text message, apps or social media accounts. + Sky Tonight - jump to the new Tonight section to see what’s visible in your sky tonight. Expanded information has been designed to help plan your night and includes Moon & Sun info, calendar curations, events and the best positioned deep sky and solar system objects. + Improved Observation Tools - SkySafari is the perfect tool to help you plan, record and organize your observations. New workflows make it easier to add, search, filter and sort data. + Home Screen and Lock Screen Widgets keep your favorite astro information at your fingertips. The Small Touches: + You can now edit the Jupiter GRS Longitude Value in the Settings. + Better Moon Age calculation. + New grid & reference options allow you to display Solstice and Equinox markers, Orbit + Node markers for all solar system objects, and tick marks and labels for the Ecliptic, Meridian, and Equator reference lines. + Previous In-app Purchases are Now Free - this includes the H-R diagram, 3D Galaxy view, and the PGC galaxy and GAIA star catalogs. Enjoy. + Many more. If you haven't used SkySafari 7 Pro before, here's what you can do with it: + Hold your device up, and SkySafari 7 Pro will find stars, constellations, planets, and more! + Simulate the night sky up to 5MM years in the past or future! Animate meteor showers, conjunctions, eclipses, and other celestial events. + Control your telescope, log and plan your observations. + Optionally backup all of your observing data in our secure cloud storage and make it easily accessible to multiple devices as well as from our new web interface, LiveSky.com. + Augmented Reality (AR) mode + Night Vision. + Orbit Mode. Leave the Earth’s surface behind, and fly through our solar system. + Galaxy View shows the position of deep sky objects in our Milky Way! https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/ https://www.livesky.com/privacy.html

应用截屏

iPhone

iPad

全部价格信息

应用描述

戴上手錶，時空驅動器啟動！ 假面騎士變身音、投籃命中、功夫特效、惡搞聲音全收錄。支援 Apple Watch，一鍵發聲，讓你隨時隨地進入童年熱血世界！ 回到童年快樂時光，成為你心中的超級英雄！ 小時候的動畫片帶給我們無限的幻想和美好的夢想——變身為超人迪迦，拯救世界；化身為蒙面騎士，與怪獸激鬥；或者像悟空一樣，發射強大的龜派氣功！這些記憶，直到今天依然深深印在我們的心中。 這款手錶APP的靈感正是來自那些經典的童年動畫片。我們希望讓你重新體驗那種變身的激動與快感，模擬成為你心中的英雄，無論是超人、龍珠中的悟空，還是蝙蝠俠和蜘蛛俠！在危難時刻，你也能像童年英雄一樣，站出來拯救世界，消滅一切敵人！ 你還記得童年時那份信念嗎？那份相信自己能變得強大的力量。現在，你可以通過這款APP再次感受到它——無論何時何地，只需輕輕一觸，變身就在眼前。 現在就下載HeroWatch 手錶變身器，重溫你的英雄夢！
